body: Gee, what are the odds that 4 women, all married, working at a place of a known playboy, all getting pregnant basically at the same time?
Nvm I found it but idk how to delete comments so I just flagged myself. Don't know if that's a good thing but in my case I never really had that much working brain cells

So could someone please add Pregnant/Impregnation to this manga's tag asap?

Thanks, Ciao!
